Sec. 32 of the Penal Code provides;

column2: "When a criminal act is done by several persons in furtherance
of the common intention of all,  each of such persons is liable for that

column1: act in the same manner as ifit were done by him alone".

column2: For the afore stated  reason  the conviction  can  not stand. We decide to

column1: set aside the judgment dated 21/01/2010 and acquit the accused appellant.
